error.bad_api: Unable to confirm Browserless running - check URL and token

user.title: Set up South East Water Usage
user.description:
You need to sign up for an South East Water account as described on the card you received when your digital water meter was installed.

The Browserless URL and Token depend on how you set up browserless (in an HA addon, or in docker).

location.title: Set up South East Water Usage

init.title: Configure South East Water Usage
init.description: Change the username or password, browserless URL or token, if required.
